summary: SECONDARY AIR INJECTION ERROR CODES P2440, P2441,P2442. LOSS OF POWER DUE TO AIR INJECTOR STUCK. VEHICLE WILL NOT ACCELERATE BEYOND 20-30 MPH. THIS IS AN EMMSISIONS REQUIREMENT BUT WARRANTIES ON TACOMAS WILL NOT COVER BEYOND 3YRS/35K MILES. TUNDRAS HAVE TUNDRAS HAVE SAME KNOWN ISSUES AND TOYOTA INCRWASED WARRANTY TO 10 YRS/150K MILES. SUDDEN LOSS OF POWER IS ALSO A SAFETY ISSUE WHILE DRIVING ON HIGHWAYS. OWNERS ARE PAYING THOUSANDS IN REPAIRS FOR SOMETHING THAT SHOULD BE COVERED UNDER WARRANTY.
